original_text: And Samuel died; and all the Israelites were gathered together, and lamented him, and buried him in his house at Ramah. And David arose, and went down to the wilderness of Paran.
korean_text: 사무엘이 죽으매 온 이스라엘 무리가 모여 그를 두고 슬피 울며 라마 그의 집에서 그를 장사한지라 다윗이 일어나 바란 광야로 내려가니라

sentences.original_text: and all the Israelites were gathered together
and buried him in his house at Ramah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 라마에 있는 그의 집에 묻었습니다

sentences.original_text: and went down to the wilderness of Paran
